title: Google Buys Data Center Company for $4.75 Billion
description: The deal for Intersect, a data center and energy developer, is set to help Google built out its infrastructure for artificial intelligence.
content:
Google has agreed to buy Intersect, a data center and energy developer, for $4.75 billion, the tech giant said on Monday, as it pushes to build out its infrastructure for artificial intelligence.
The all-cash deal is set to help Google bolster the su... [1834 chars]

title: The rise of deepfake cyberbullying poses a growing problem for schools
description: Schools are facing a growing problem of students using artificial intelligence to transform innocent images of classmates into sexually explicit deepfakes. title: AI could help predict nutrition risks in ICU patients
description: A new study by researchers at the Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai suggests that artificial intelligence (AI) could help predict which critically ill patients on ventilators are at risk of underfeeding, potentially enabling clinicians to adjust nutrition early and improve patient care. Details of the study were published in the December 17 online issue of Nature Communications.
content: A new study by researchers at the Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai suggests that artificial intelligence (AI) could help predict which critically ill patients on ventilators are at risk of underfeeding, potentially enabling clinicians to adjus... [3864 chars]

title: The Tech and Business Landscape of 2025: From AI Search Wars to the New Space Economy
description: The technology sector is currently experiencing one of its most dynamic periods in history. title: Bank of America’s Moynihan Says AI’s Economic Benefit Is ‘Kicking In More’
description: Bank of America Corp. Chief Executive Officer Brian Moynihan said that artificial intelligence is starting to have a bigger impact on the US economy.
content:

title: Providing AI training leads to more critical and ethical use by university students
description: No longer a technological novelty, generative artificial intelligence (GenAI) has become a common tool for everyday academic tasks among the university community. In view of this, the Universitat Oberta de Catalunya (UOC) has carried out a research project to establish the extent to which GenAI-specific training can help ensure more responsible and critical use by students.

title: Mawson Infrastructure Group Inc. Announces Compliance with Nasdaq Continued Listing Requirements
description: MIDLAND, Pa., Dec. 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Mawson Infrastructure Group Inc. (NASDAQ: MIGI) ('Mawson” or the 'Company”), a U.S. based technology company that designs, builds, and operates next-generation digital infrastructure platforms providing services to the artificial intelligence (AI), high-performance computing (HPC), and digital assets (including Bitcoin mining), and other intensive compute applications market sectors, announced that the Company has received notice of compliance with Nasdaq’s requirements for continued listing on The Nasdaq Capital Market.

title: Google parent Alphabet buys Intersect in $4.75 billion deal to secure AI data centre power
description: The acquisition underscores how access to reliable and affordable electricity is becoming a strategic priority for big tech firms as artificial intelligence accelerates data centre expansion, even as rising power demand triggers concerns among local communities and regulators.
